body_html:
Hi @bobzhuyb,
The mlock solution still doesn't make sense to me.
it shouldn't have any effect, unless you a severe driver issues.
Can u involve RDMA community in this issue in https://github.com/linux-rdma/rdma-core ?

Anyway my issue still not solved, I opened an issue in #11725.

Any help is appreciated, if u can take a look.
@junshi15 @byronyi if u have time I would be delighted as well.

body:
Hi @bobzhuyb, 
The mlock solution still doesn't make sense to me.
it shouldn't have any effect, unless you a severe driver issues.
Can u involve RDMA community in this issue in https://github.com/linux-rdma/rdma-core ? 

Anyway my issue still not solved, I opened an issue in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/11725.

Any help is appreciated, if u can take a look.
@junshi15 @byronyi if u have time I would be delighted as well.
